event.title: died of the H5N1 Avian Flu virus in China on December 2, 2007

data.event: A 52-year-old man, said to be the father of a man who died of the H5N1 Avian Flu virus in China on December 2, 2007, has also contracted the virus and Chinese officials are now concerned about human to human transmission.

A 52-year-old man, said to be the father of a man who died of the H5N1 Avian Flu virus in China on December 2, 2007, has also contracted the virus and Chinese officials are now concerned about human to human transmission.

event.title: December 9, the World Health Organization reported

data.event: As of December 9, the World Health Organization reported that the total number of deaths from the H5N1 in China is 17.
